mapper.select: select count(distinct u.user_id) as worker_number, count(distinct lr.employee_id) as leave_number, sum(case when lr.employee_id then 1 else 0 end) as absence_number from sys_user u left join leave_record lr on (u.user_id = lr.employee_id and date_format(lr.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') and date_format(lr.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d')) left join attendance_record ar on (ar.employee_number = u.employee_number and date_format(ar.date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d')) where u.del_flag = '0' group by u.user_id
select sum(amount) from reward_punishment_record where date_format(record_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m')
